entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Snow level 1300 metres. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023
